data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 3 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 3


This product depicts 58 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Hunters, Winged Kobolds, Dragonclaws, Violet Fungi, Stirges, Dragonborn, Troglodytes, Guard Drakes, Kobolds, Beserkers, Roper, Kobolds with bombs, Guards, Cultists, both male and female, Dragon Eggs, both cracked open and whole. And as a bonus I have included 4 treasure chests, both opened and closed along with 2 other bonus tokens from Pack 2.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 5 Chests
  • 7 different colored Dragon Eggs
  • Dragonborn Champion
  • 2 Dragonclaws
  • 2 Female Cultists
  • Female Head Cleric
  • 6 Flying Kobolds
  • 4 Guard Drakes
  • 2 Kobolds with Daggers
  • 2 Kobolds with Fire Bombs
  • 2 Kobolds with Glue Bombs
  • 2 Kobolds with Slings
  • 2 male Bezerkers
  • 2 Male Cultists
  • Male Cultist Sleeping
  • 4 Male Human Guards
  • 2 Male Hunters
  • Roper
  • Roper, Hidden
  • 4 Stirges
  • 4 Troglodytes
  • 2 Vilet Fungi

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 06, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
